text:
What's up everyone? Today we are learning
English with three classic romantic

comedies starring:
Adam Sandler, Andrew Barrymore

By the way, in case you're new here,
I want to let you know that

every week we make lessons to help
you learn fast English.

Without getting lost, without missing the
jokes,

and without subtitles. In fact, Melisa
says that she's already started to sound

like a native from watching
our amazing lessons.

So if that sounds good to you
don't forget to hit that Subscribe

button and the Bell down below,
so that you don't miss
any of our new lessons!

Do you struggle to understand fast
speaking natives?

Then I highly recommend our
Fluent with Friends Course!

In this 48-week course you will learn
with the first two seasons of Friends.

You'll receive PDF Power Lessons every
week,

vocabulary memorization software, access to
our Fluency Circle Global Community,
and so much more!

And did you know you
can try it right now for FREE with our 3-Part Masterclass!
All you have to do is click up here or

in the description box below to
learn more and sign up now.
We hope to see you there!
If you're enjoying this lesson then why

not check out our lesson with
the Taylor Swift song "Lover" next.

You can click up here or in the
description box below to watch it
straight after this lesson.
